ComicInfo.Title: Surrounded By the Marauders
ComicInfo.Series: Amanda Hocking's The Hollows: A Hollowland Graphic Novel
ComicInfo.Summary: A digital release! Caught by Maurauders on the streets of a ghost town, Remy and her companions must decide whether to accept the help of a stranger - but will they accept before one of them dies? As the zombies get closer, so do Remy and Lazlo... as we continue through this enhanced adaptation of Amanda Hocking's best selling novel HOLLOWLAND by #1 New York Times bestseller Tony Lee (X-Men Unlimited, Doctor Who), and Steve Uy (Avengers Initiative, JSA Classified)! Dynamite Entertainment proudly presents Amanda Hocking's The Hollows: A Hollowland graphic novel.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-09 14:50:00. [CVDB420666]
